quests.title: Slay the Dragon
quests.description: Defeat the mighty dragon in the mountain cave. Beware of its fire breath!

quests.title: Collect Healing Herbs
quests.description: Gather 20 healing herbs from the enchanted forest for the village healer.

quests.title: Find the Lost Treasure
quests.description: Locate the hidden treasure in the ancient ruins before the bandits find it.

quests.title: Rescue the Villagers
quests.description: Save the innocent villagers captured by goblin raiders.

quests.title: Defeat the Shadow Knight
quests.description: Battle the cursed Shadow Knight in the dark tower and break the curse.

quests.title: Retrieve the Ancient Artifact
quests.description: Find the mystical artifact hidden in the temple of the ancients.

clans.name: Dragon Slayers
clans.description: Elite warriors dedicated to defeating dragons and protecting the realm

clans.name: Treasure Seekers
clans.description: Adventurers hunting for ancient treasures and lost artifacts

clans.name: Shadow Order
clans.description: Mysterious guild of skilled assassins and spies
